member.name: T:DataSinkApp.Database1DataSet
member.summary: Represents a strongly typed in-memory cache of data.

member.name: T:DataSinkApp.Extract.ExtractThread
member.summary: Class which contains all the functionality for the Extract process which will copy the neccessary data from the PASNGR database, and copy it to the StagingDB

member.name: M:DataSinkApp.Extract.ExtractThread.ExtractData
member.summary: Static method which we be called from Program.Main. This method will extract the data from the PASNGR DB and copy it to the StagingDB using BulkCopy.
member.returns: bool - success or failure, true for errors, false for no errors

member.name: M:DataSinkApp.Extract.ExtractThread.GetLastRecipientID
member.summary: Static method which is used to get the last recipientID added to the DataWarehouse. This is to ensure we don't retrieve any duplicate recipients or miss any recipients.
member.returns: int - the recipientID (0 if no results returned)

member.name: T:DataSinkApp.Load.Load
member.summary: Class which contains all the functionality for the Load Process which will load the data into the DataWarehouse.

member.name: M:DataSinkApp.Load.Load.LoadData
member.summary: Static method which we be called from Program.Main. This method will Load the data from the StagingDB into the DataWarehouse by executing a Stored Procedure in the StagingDB. Once data loading is complete, another stored procedure will be executed in the StagingDB to clean up the StagingDB.
member.returns: bool - success or failure, true for errors, false for no errors

member.name: T:DataSinkApp.Program
member.summary: Main class for the application which will control the ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) Process and will then reprocess the CUBE

member.name: M:DataSinkApp.Program.Main
member.summary: The entry point for the application. The Extract, Load and Transform processes will be executed here, one after the other unless an error occurs at one during one of the processes, in which case, the ETL process will stop.

member.name: M:DataSinkApp.Program.ProcessCube
member.summary: Static method which we be called from Main. This method is responsible for processing the cube, which will take place one the ETL process is complete.
member.returns: bool - success or failure, true for errors, false for no errors

member.name: T:DataSinkApp.Transform.Transform
member.summary: Class which contains all the functionality for the Transform process which will transform the data as neccessary in the StagingDB.

member.name: M:DataSinkApp.Transform.Transform.TransformData
member.summary: Static method which we be called from Program.Main. This method will Tranform the data in the StagingDB accordingly by executing Stored Procedures in the StagingDB. This will also prepare the data for Transfer to the DataWarehouse.
member.returns: bool - success or failure, true for errors, false for no errors
